question.lead:
Please click here to begin the study.

After completing the communication, please return using the button provided.
You may then close this window.

Please click here to begin the study.

After completing the communication, please return using the button provided.
You may then close this window.

question.explanation:
Welcome to this study on **gender-aware language in chatbot interactions**.
We’re conducting research on how the use of gender-specific versus gender-neutral language in chatbot communication influences user engagement.
**Procedure**
In this study, you’ll briefly talk to the chatbot "StyleBot" that provides outfit suggestions based on a few details you provide. Your task is simple: you'll choose a scenario, and StyleBot will suggest clothing options based on the context and your preferences. After the chatbot conversation, you’ll be asked to complete a brief follow-up survey about your engagement.
**Duration**
The entire process should only take about **5 minutes**.
**Anonymity & Voluntary participation**
Your responses are completely **anonymous** and will be used only for academic purposes as part of a university seminar project. The study does not collect any personally identifying data. Participation is **voluntary**, and you may stop at any time.
--
If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us at:
//ahju.jang@stud.tu-darmstadt.de//
We really appreciate your participation!

item.text: I am at least 18 years old and consent to participate.
I do not wish to participate.

question.lead: Thank you for your time. You may now close this window.

question.explanation:
Welcome to this study on **gender-aware language in chatbot interactions**.
We’re conducting research on how the use of gender-specific versus gender-neutral language in chatbot communication influences user engagement.
**Procedure**
In this study, you’ll briefly talk to the chatbot "StyleBot" that provides outfit suggestions based on a few details you provide. After the chatbot conversation, you’ll be asked to complete a brief follow-up survey about your engagement.

The entire process should only take about **5 minutes**.

item.text: I am at least 18 years old and consent to participate.
I do not wish to participate.

question.title: Post-survey
question.explanation: Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the following statements about your chatbot experience.

item.text: I lost myself in this chatbot-experience.
The time I spent using StyleBot just slipped away.
I was absorbed in this chatbot-experience.
I felt frustrated while using StyleBot.
I found StyleBot confusing to use.

question.explanation: Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the following statements about your chatbot experience.

item.text: I felt interested in this experience.

question.title: Additional suggestions
question.explanation: Is there anything else you would like to share about your experience with StyleBot? Feel free to share anything you found helpful, confusing, surprising, or unclear.

question.lead: Before we finish, we’d like to ask a few brief demographic questions. Your answers will help us better understand our participants and interpret the study results. All responses are anonymous and optional.

question.title: Current occupation
question.explanation: Please select your current occupation or status.

layoutText.txt: Anju Jang, Technical University of Darmstadt – 2025
